node.doctext:
What's going on? What's this whole noding thing? What's with these "votes", and why don't I have any?

If these are the questions which come to mind, maybe you should come in. The room is restricted to new users, and editors -- a place to ask questions outside of the public eye.

Make sure to start with the [E2 FAQ],
the source of all that is good and good.
node.title: Noders Nursery
